name: Deimos
overview: Deimos is a platform game similar to the Montezuma's Revenge. The player assumes the role of a treasure hunter. The goal is to find an ancient treasure hidden deep inside old castle catacombs. The legendary Deimos Chalice is guarded by hostile creatures and various traps. Collision with an enemy or a trap leads to the loss of energy. The archaeologist can jump, climb ladders and use various items, such as door keys, pickaxe, skull, dagger, energy potions, and others.
